-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Wrapper to Random.org API
--   
--   Simple but complete wrapper to Random.org API
@package librandomorg
@version 0.0.1.0


-- | Random.org API module
module Network.Randomorg

-- | Specify the randomization method
data RNG

-- | Truly random bitstream
New :: RNG

-- | Determine randomization from a large pool of pregenerated bits
Id :: String -> RNG

-- | Determine randomization based on one of the daily pregenerated files.
--   The date must be in YYYY-MM-DD format or one of the two shorthand
--   strings <tt>today</tt> or <tt>yesterday</tt>.
Date :: String -> RNG

-- | Generate random integers in configurable intervals
integers :: Int -> Int -> Int -> RNG -> IO (Maybe [Int])

-- | Shuffle integers in given interval
--   
--   NOTE: Maintains the invariant `max - min + 1 &lt;= 1e4'
--   
--   NOTE: Doesn't maintain the invariant `max &gt;= min'
shuffle :: Int -> Int -> RNG -> IO (Maybe [Int])

-- | Generate random strings of various length and composition
strings :: Int -> Int -> Bool -> Bool -> Bool -> Bool -> RNG -> IO [String]

-- | Examine quota for given IP address
quota :: Maybe (Word8, Word8, Word8, Word8) -> IO (Maybe Integer)
instance Get RNG
instance Get (Word8, Word8, Word8, Word8)
instance Get Bool
instance Get Int
